title: Real Estate Website
description:
## Overview

Production-grade real estate platform built with the **MERN** stack (MongoDB, Express, React, Node.js) and **MUI**. Enables buyers to discover properties via fast search, granular filters, and rich detail pages with agent contact workflows.

### Goals
- Help users find relevant listings quickly with robust search.
- Provide trustworthy, engaging listing pages with complete details.
- Improve lead generation via integrated agent contact forms.

### Key Features
- Faceted search: location, price range, bedrooms, bathrooms, amenities.
- Sort by relevance, newest, price, and proximity.
- Mobile-first UI with responsive image galleries and thumbnails.
- Saved filters and deep-linked, SEO-friendly URLs.

### Architecture
- React + MUI front-end with route-based code splitting.
- Express/Node API for listings, agents, and saved searches.
- MongoDB schemas for `Listing`, `Agent`, and `Inquiry`.
- Image CDN + lazy loading for fast media delivery.

### Role & Responsibilities
- Designed schema and API endpoints.
- Implemented search/filter UX and gallery.

### Results
- Median page load: < 1.5s on 4G.
- 32% increase in qualified inquiries (pilot).
summary: MERN real estate platform with fast search, filters, and lead flows.

title: Financial Website
description:
## Overview

MERN-based financial services site with product catalog, calculators, and secure contact flows.

### Key Features
- Loan calculators and amortization charts
- Referral tracking system
- Secure forms and validation

### Role & Responsibilities
- Implemented calculators and charts
- Built secure endpoints
summary: Financial SaaS with calculators, referrals, and secure forms.

title: E-Commerce Website
description:
## Overview

Shopify storefront customized with **Liquid**, supported by **Node.js + Express** services.

### Key Features
- Fast product search
- Persistent cart and checkout
- Webhook integrations

### Role & Responsibilities
- Theme customization
- Webhook and discount logic
summary: Shopify + Node services with fast checkout and search.

title: Website Reservation System (Capstone Project)
description:
## Overview

A capstone project focused on developing a **Website Reservation System** for **John Cezar Waterfun Resort**, which currently operates without an online booking platform. The system aims to streamline reservations, improve customer experience, and support the resortâ€™s business operations.

### Goals
- Provide customers with a convenient online reservation process.
- Centralize booking management for the business.
- Reduce manual reservation errors and improve efficiency.

### Key Features
- Online reservation and scheduling system.
- Room and facility availability management.
- Customer information and booking records.
- Admin dashboard for reservation monitoring.

### Architecture
- MERN stack (MongoDB, Express, React, Node.js).
- RESTful API for reservations, users, and availability.
- Role-based access for customers and business staff.

### Role & Responsibilities
- Project Manager and Full Stack Developer.
- System design, database modeling, and API development.
- UI/UX design using MUI, Figma, and Canva.

###
summary: Capstone MERN-based reservation system for a water resort.
